name: I Am (S)He, Who Is a Living Log
description:
Ulyana Podkorytova.
I Am (S)He, Who Is a Living Log. 2022. MP4, 2000  x  1462, 15". Based on the artwork from Aksenov Family Foundation Collection.

Ulyana Podkorytova is an artist, who explores the problems of loss of identity in the era of globalization and post-folklore. She works in video, voice performance, sculpture, and graphics. Works are in the MMOMA, Moscow and private collections.

"The motifs of all the works are based on internal mythology, but at the same time, there are some references to the folklore of the Russian North, which inspires me. 
I am attracted by the aesthetics of the terrible and the funny, as it is impossible to live without fun, knowing that life is finite" - Ulyana Podkorytova.
